results.title: Krome Studios: Screen Worlds Spotlight interview
results.brief_description: An interview with Krome Studios for Screen Worlds at ACMI. Krome Studios is a video game development studio most well known for their “Ty the Tasmanian Tiger” games.

results.title: Sue Smith and John Alsop : Screen Worlds Spotlight interview
results.brief_description: An interview with screenwriters Sue Smith and John Alsop for Screen Worlds at ACMI. Sue Smith and John Alsop are screenwriters and playwrights who have collaborated on productions such as “My Brother Jack”, “Brides of Christ”, “Bordertown” and “The Leaving of Liverpool”.

results.title: Animal Logic: Screen Worlds Spotlight interview
results.brief_description: An interview with Animal Logic for Screen Worlds at ACMI. Animal Logic is an animation and visual effects digital studio known for their role on films such as “Happy Feet”, “The Lego Movie” and “Peter Rabbit”.

results.title: Jill Bilcock: Screen Worlds Spotlight interview
results.brief_description: An interview with film editor Jill Bilcock for Screen Worlds at ACMI. Jill Bilcock is an editor known for her work on “Strictly Ballroom”, “Romeo + Juliet” and “Elizabeth”.

results.title: Yoram Gross : Screen Worlds Spotlight interview
results.brief_description: An interview with producer Yoram Gross for Screen Worlds at ACMI. Yoram Gross founded the Yoram Gross Film Studio and was known for his work on animated films and TV series including “Blinky Bill”, the “Dot” series, and “The Magic Riddle”.

results.title: Chris Doyle: Screen Worlds Spotlight interview
results.brief_description: An interview with cinematographer Chris Doyle for Screen Worlds at ACMI. Chris Doyle is a cinematographer well known for his work on films directed by Wong Kar Wai, including “Chungking Express”, “In the Mood for Love” and “Happy Together”.

results.title: Rolf de Heer: Screen Worlds Spotlight interview
results.brief_description: An interview with director Rolf de Heer for Screen Worlds at ACMI. Rolf de Heer is a film director whose credits include “Ten Canoes”, “Charlie’s Country” and “The Tracker”.

results.title: Chris Masters: Screen Worlds Spotlight interview
results.brief_description: An interview with journalist Chris Masters created for Screen Worlds at ACMI. Chris Masters is an investigative journalist who has won several Gold Walkley awards and reported for the ABC’s “Four Corners”.

results.title: Rippled
results.creator_credit: Darcy Prendergast, All India Radio and Oh Yeah Wow Pty Ltd
results.brief_description:
‘Rippled’ features a range of animation techniques - including light painting - to evoke a dystopian nighttime urban landscape of eerie beauty being explored by a creature of ambiguous identity.
Animators: Josh Thomas, Michael Greaney, Josh OKeefe, Donna Yeatman, Darcy Prendergast, Seamus Spilsbury, Andrew Onorato
Music: Martin Kennedy (All India Radio)

results.title: Subconscious Password
results.creator_credit: Mark Smith, Marcy Page, Chris Landreth, Seneca College Animation Arts Centre, Copperheart Entertainment and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description:
Most of us have had at least one of those excruciating social encounters where you can’t remember someone’s name. Just what is your subconscious up to while you frantically try to recall it?
Cast includes: Don McKellar, Ron Pardo, Patrice Goodman, Ray Landry, Tony Daniels, Athena Karkanis, Nanci Pach, Kedar, Denise Oliver, Dwayne Hill, Chris Landreth and John R. Dilworth.
Music: Daniel Janke
Animation direction and layout: Sean Craig
